name: @fvlab/firebasertdbconfigurationstore
description: Simple application settings or document storage using your Firebase project's Realtime database

scripts.docs: ./node_modules/.bin/typedoc --name "Firebase Realtime Database Configuration Store" --theme minimal --out ./docs/ --target ES6 --module commonjs --exclude "**/{dist,docs,node_modules}/**/*" ./src

author: FairVentures Lab
